response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be equally beneficial to you. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000, which represents an exceptional value considering its worth and the benefits it offers. We understand the importance of making a decision that aligns with your financial planning and goals. Therefore, should you choose to proceed, we assure you of a seamless transaction and dedicated support throughout the process. Please let us know if you require any further information or have questions about the product or the offer.", "product_price": 950000}
